ygData.subject: Proxy Authentication Issue!

Hi,
I'm desperately looking for a solution to my proxy problem, could you 
=
pls help?

I am using Heritrix in my "focused" Web crawler application. How=
ever, 
my company uses proxy authentication (NTLM scheme) so I got connecti=
on 
refused problem.

I've attempted to add the following: Put the proxy IP=
 address, port, 
network user name and password in the order.xml file. Thes=
e are then 
read by the FetchHTTP processor. In the innerProcess() method o=
f this 
processor, I do the following:

NTCredentials ntCredentials =3D new=
 NTCredentials(login, pwd, 
myComputerName, domain);
//where login and pwd =
are my network login and pwd taken from order.xml
//myComputerName and doma=
in are obtained from My Computer's 
Properties. I've tried both short name =
for the computername and 
fullname (including the domain)

AuthScope authsc=
ope =3D new AuthScope( host, Integer.parseInt(port), 
null, "ntlm");
//is n=
ull correct for realm here? I also tried to use domain instead 
of null but=
 no luck
//where host and port are taken from order.xml
//then set proxy cr=
edentials
this.http.getState().setProxyCredentials( authscope, ntCredential=
s);  

I then setDoAuthentication() to true.

When running the application,=
 I receive the following error:
Failure authenticating with NTLM <any realm=
>@....x.x:xxxx
Nov 23, 2006 5:37:30 PM org.archive.crawler.fetcher.Fetc=
hHTTP 
innerProcess
INFO: GET http://www.abc.edu/ 407 4515 text/html

-----=
---
The "407" status code means proxy authentication required. And the 
HTM=
L page I received contains:
The ISA Server requires authorization to fulfil=
l the request. Access 
to the Web Proxy filter is denied.  )Via: 1.1 PROXY1=
Proxy-
Authenticate: NegotiateProxy-Authenticate: KerberosProxy-Authenticat=
e: 
NTLM
---------
Pls give me your suggestions on what I may have done wro=
ng here?
Any idea is highly appreciated!
